allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''temp-check'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Expand-Archive -Path ''professor-synapse.zip'' -DestinationPath ''temp-check'' -Force; Get-ChildItem -Recurse ''temp-check'' | Select-Object FullName")

Bash(powershell.exe -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force ''temp-check'' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Compress-Archive -Path ''professor-synapse'' -DestinationPath ''professor-synapse.zip''; Expand-Archive -Path ''professor-synapse.zip'' -DestinationPath ''temp-check''; Get-ChildItem -Recurse ''temp-check'' | Select-Object FullName")
